original_text: So I am always afraid. My honour has disappeared as if a strong wind has blown it away. My riches have also gone, like a cloud that passes across the sky. So I am always afraid.
korean_text: 순식간에 공포가 나를 에워싸고 그들이 내 품위를 바람 같이 날려 버리니 나의 구원은 구름 같이 지나가 버렸구나

sentences.original_text: as if a strong wind has blown it away.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 강한 바람이 그것을 날려버린 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: like a cloud that passes across the sky.
